Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class SocketNetworkHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.SocketNetworkHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkHandler, java.lang.Runnable
public class SocketNetworkHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, NetworkHandler
Class used to implement the network communication between Client-Server. It is stored client-side It is charged to establish the connection with the server, read messages from the server and send messages to the server
